reqs:
- An application form is required for admission to this module. You will be registered in APSC 541 by the APSC graduate program office. Please visit the BAEN 506 (APSC 541) website for more information: http://www.sauder.ubc.ca/Programs/RHL_Current_Students/Modules_-_1st_Years/BAEN_506
- This module will be jointly held with BAEN 506 001.
- An application form is required for admission to this module. You will be registered in APSC 541 by APSC graduate program office. Please visit the BAEN 506 (APSC 541) website for more information: http://www.sauder.ubc.ca/Programs/RHL_Current_Students/Modules_-_1st_Years/BAEN_506

description: A broad introduction to the entrepreneurial process, for engineers who would like to form or grow a technology company, and those with a general interest in the field. Key factors of new venture creation are identified and evaluated.
